title: Cape, 1750–1800
creditline: Gift of Mrs. James O. Green
description: Cape for ecclesiastical figurine, made of a fabric that is patterned with the figure  of a man in Chinese costume sitting on rocks under a tree playing a flute.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. silk
woven. Gift of Mrs. James O. Green. 1896-11-3.
